item.title: How to make Jekyll multilingual
item.description: One of the few requirements that existed for this blog was to be multilingual. This is something that one can easily do with WordPress these days, but then I got turned on to GitHub Pages and one thing led to another and â€¦. many hours later I had a blog that became multilingual, through mercilessly hacking the beautiful Whiteglass theme. Here is a brief explanation of how I made it happen.
